title: Handle a Customs Inspection
description: An inbound international shipment has been selected for a random physical inspection by customs.

tasks.description: Receive a notification from the customs broker about the inspection.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent is alerted to the inspection.

tasks.description: Coordinate with the carrier and the customs officials to arrange the inspection.
Monitor the status of the inspection.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent waits for the inspection to be completed.

tasks.description: Once the shipment is released, update the ETA and notify relevant internal teams.
tasks.expected_outcome: The shipment is released, and the agent updates the system and notifies stakeholders of the new delivery date.
